prod_short_desc: Have fun at the seaside with Stephanie and Andrea!
prod_long_desc:
Splash around at the LEGO® Friends beach with Stephanie and Andrea, featuring an Easy to Build speedboat, dock with slide, smoothie stand, loungers, shower and assorted accessories to create a perfect, fun-packed day out in the sun. LEGO Juniors is an age-appropriate build and play experience for ages 4-7. Includes two mini-doll figures and a dolphin figure.
Build your own Beach Holiday, complete with speedboat that floats, dock with slide, smoothie stand and accessories!
Includes two mini-dolls, Stephanie and Andrea, plus dolphin figure
LEGO Juniors brick building toys are compatible with all other LEGO construction sets for creative building
Beach scene and smoothie stand measures over 3” high, 7” wide and 2” long. Speedboat measures over 1” high, 5” long and 2” wide
Dock with slide measures over 3” high, 4” wide and 2” long
143 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 4 and 7 years old
